title: LoL launcher not working
body: I just downloaded league of legends on my new mac and when try to open the application, it just stops working. Please help me.

replies.body:
Most of the issues on the Mac client stem from a poor connection to the servers. I recommend taking a look at our [Mac Connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#section-mac) for a list of really common solutions.

Let me know if those steps resolved this or not.
